answerText: Geneva or Genève or Genf or Ginevra[10] This capital of Vaud canton sits on Lake Geneva's northern shore. It's been the site of a couple of international treaties, and today contains the headquarters of the International Olympic Committee.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Alabama + Yale C + Alberta | 14 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] This city on the western end of Switzerland is situated where the Rhone meets its namesake lake. Its namesake canton calls itself a republic.
